titles.title: Stewardship Endowment Fund Act of 1993
A bill to establish a Stewardship Endowment Fund to fund activities for the restoration of injured natural resources in Alaska resulting from the T/V EXXON VALDEZ oil spill, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16814-16815)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Stewardship Endowment Fund Act of 1993 - Amends the Energy Policy Act of 1992 to establish in the Treasury a Stewardship Endowment Fund to facilitate the restoration of natural resources in Alaska injured as a result of the EXXON VALDEZ oil spill.
